name: Chicken Jam
description:
An experimental farmer is endlessly running round collecting eggs to hatch chickens. The only problem is, if the cat manages to get hold of the last chicken hatched, he will start eating all of them!

Use W A S D to move.

Game made in three days for Coding Blocks Game Jam 2022

Credits

Audio

All sound taken from https://freesound.org/
